body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Allen Motors. My name is John Allen. May I have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Michelle. For security purposes, may I please have your date of birth? Please spell it out, for example, one nine eight zero.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one nine eight five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Could you also provide the first four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's eight six seven five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Michelle. Is there anything else you would like to discuss regarding your security concerns at Allen Motors?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Not at the moment, thanks for addressing my concerns.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Michelle. Thank you for reaching out to us and feel free to contact us anytime. Have a great day!
